original_text: For it was of the Lord to harden their hearts, that they should come against Israel in battle, that he might destroy them utterly, and that they might have no favour, but that he might destroy them, as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 그들의 마음이 완악하여 이스라엘을 대적하여 싸우러 온 것은 여호와께서 그리하게 하신 것이라 그들을 진멸하여 바치게 하여 은혜를 입지 못하게 하시고 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 그들을 멸하려 하심이었더라

sentences.original_text: For it was of the Lord
that they should come against Israel in battle
that he might destroy them utterly
and that they might have no favour
but that he might destroy them

sentences.korean_translation: 이는 여호와께서 모세에게 명하신 바와 같이니라
